nodes.title: NumPy Introduction
nodes.desc: Learn the basics of NumPy, a library for efficient numerical computation in Python. [NumPy Documentation](https://numpy.org/doc/)

nodes.title: Arrays and Data Types
nodes.desc: Understand the different data types and array structures in NumPy, including ndarrays and datatypes. [NumPy Arrays](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/arrays.html)

nodes.title: Debugging and Testing
nodes.desc: Understand how to debug and test NumPy code using tools like pdb and unittest. [NumPy Debugging and Testing](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/building.html)

nodes.title: NumPy for Data Science
nodes.desc: Learn how to use NumPy for data science tasks, including data cleaning, visualization, and machine learning. [NumPy for Data Science](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/basics.html#data-science)

nodes.title: NumPy for Scientific Computing
nodes.desc: Understand how to use NumPy for scientific computing tasks, including numerical methods and simulations. [NumPy for Scientific Computing](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/basics.html#scientific-computing)

nodes.title: NumPy Community
nodes.desc: Join the NumPy community and learn from other users, developers, and experts. [NumPy Community](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/community.html)

nodes.title: NumPy Documentation
nodes.desc: Access the official NumPy documentation, including tutorials, guides, and reference materials. [NumPy Documentation](https://numpy.org/doc/)

nodes.title: NumPy Source Code
nodes.desc: Explore the NumPy source code and learn from the implementation. [NumPy Source Code](https://github.com/numpy/numpy)

nodes.title: Array Operations
nodes.desc: Learn how to perform basic array operations, such as indexing, slicing, and reshaping. [NumPy Array Operations](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/arrays.ndarray.html)

nodes.title: Linear Algebra
nodes.desc: Discover how to perform linear algebra operations, including matrix multiplication and eigenvalue decomposition. [NumPy Linear Algebra](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/routines.linalg.html)

nodes.title: Random Number Generation
nodes.desc: Learn how to generate random numbers using NumPy's random module. [NumPy Random](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/random/index.html)

nodes.title: Statistical Functions
nodes.desc: Understand how to use NumPy's statistical functions, including mean, median, and standard deviation. [NumPy Statistical Functions](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/routines.statistics.html)

nodes.title: Data Manipulation
nodes.desc: Learn how to manipulate data using NumPy's functions, including sorting, indexing, and grouping. [NumPy Data Manipulation](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/routines.array-manipulation.html)

nodes.title: Integration with Other Libraries
nodes.desc: Understand how to integrate NumPy with other popular libraries, including Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn. [NumPy Integration](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/basics.html#integration-with-other-libraries)

nodes.title: Advanced Topics
nodes.desc: Explore advanced topics in NumPy, including broadcasting, advanced indexing, and ufuncs. [NumPy Advanced Topics](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/advanced-indexing.html)

nodes.title: Performance Optimization
nodes.desc: Learn how to optimize performance using NumPy's functions, including vectorization and parallel processing. [NumPy Performance Optimization](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/building.html)
